statements: SELECT * FROM Music LIMIT 10;
SELECT Title, Artist FROM Music WHERE Genre='Rock';
SELECT * FROM Music WHERE Year > 2000;
SELECT Title, Artist FROM Music WHERE Duration <= 180;
SELECT DISTINCT Genre FROM Music;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Music;
SELECT AVG(Duration) AS AverageDuration FROM Music;
SELECT MAX(Year) AS LatestYear FROM Music;
SELECT MIN(Year) AS OldestYear FROM Music;
SELECT Title, Artist FROM Music ORDER BY Year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT Artist, COUNT(*) AS SongCount FROM Music GROUP BY Artist;
SELECT Genre, AVG(Duration) AS AverageDuration FROM Music GROUP BY Genre;
SELECT Title, Artist, Duration FROM Music WHERE Artist LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Music WHERE Artist IN ('Queen', 'The Beatles', 'Led Zeppelin');
SELECT Title, Artist, Genre FROM Music WHERE Genre='Pop' AND Year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT DISTINCT Artist FROM Music WHERE Title LIKE '%Love%';
SELECT Title, Year, Duration FROM Music WHERE Duration > 240 ORDER BY Year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT Title, Year, Genre FROM Music WHERE Genre='Hip Hop' AND Year < 1990;
SELECT Title, Artist, Genre FROM Music WHERE Genre IN ('R&B', 'Soul');
SELECT Title, Artist, Year FROM Music WHERE Artist='Bob Marley' ORDER BY Year ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock'
SELECT id, name FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop'
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre IN ('Hip-Hop', 'R&B')
SELECT id, name, genre FROM artists WHERE id > 10
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM artists
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM artists
SELECT id, COUNT(id) AS count FROM artists GROUP BY id
SELECT name, COUNT(name) AS count FROM artists GROUP BY name HAVING count > 1
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM artists
SELECT MIN(id) AS min_id FROM artists
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM artists
SELECT SUM(id) AS sum_id FROM artists
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY genre ASC, name DESC
SELECT * FROM artists LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM artists OFFSET 5
SELECT * FROM artists LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM artists
SELECT name, genre FROM artists
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre='Pop'
SELECT title, release_date FROM albums
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT title, duration FROM songs
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE duration > 180
SELECT artists.name, albums.title, songs.title FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id
SELECT artists.name AS artist_name, albums.title AS album_title, songs.title AS song_title FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id
SELECT artists.name, COUNT(albums.id) AS album_count FROM artists LEFT JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id GROUP BY artists.name
SELECT artists.name, MAX(songs.duration) AS max_duration FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id GROUP BY artists.name
SELECT artists.name, MIN(songs.duration) AS min_duration FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id GROUP BY artists.name
SELECT artists.name, AVG(songs.duration) AS avg_duration FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id GROUP BY artists.name
SELECT artists.name, SUM(songs.duration) AS total_duration FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id GROUP BY artists.name
SELECT artists.name, albums.title, songs.title FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id INNER JOIN songs ON albums.id = songs.album_id
SELECT DISTINCT artists.name, albums.title FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY duration ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre='Rock' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Artist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT name, genre FROM Artist ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Album WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, release_date FROM Album WHERE artist_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Song WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT title, duration FROM Song WHERE artist_id = 3 AND album_id = 7;
SELECT name, genre FROM Artist INNER JOIN Album ON Artist.id = Album.artist_id WHERE Album.title = 'Greatest Hits';
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM Artist;
SELECT MAX(duration) FROM Song;
SELECT AVG(duration) FROM Song WHERE artist_id = 4;
SELECT name, release_date FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.id WHERE Artist.genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM Song WHERE title LIKE 'Love%';
SELECT title, genre FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.id WHERE Artist.name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT SUM(duration) FROM Song WHERE album_id = 10;
SELECT name, description FROM Playlist WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Artist WHERE id IN (SELECT artist_id FROM Album WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2019-01-01');
SELECT MIN(duration) FROM Song WHERE artist_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM Song ORDER BY album_id, duration ASC;
SELECT name, genre FROM Artist WHERE id = 8;

SELECT artist_name FROM artists
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists
SELECT album_name FROM albums
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums
SELECT * FROM songs
SELECT song_name FROM songs
SELECT song_id, song_name FROM songs
SELECT * FROM genres
SELECT genre_name FROM genres
SELECT * FROM song_genre
SELECT genre_id FROM song_genre
SELECT song_id, genre_id FROM song_genre
SELECT s.song_name, a.album_name FROM songs s JOIN albums a ON s.album_id = a.album_id
SELECT a.artist_name, s.song_name FROM artists a JOIN albums al ON a.artist_id = al.artist_id JOIN songs s ON al.album_id = s.album_id
SELECT s.song_name, g.genre_name FROM songs s JOIN song_genre sg ON s.song_id = sg.song_id JOIN genres g ON sg.genre_id = g.genre_id

SELECT a.artist_name, g.genre_name FROM artists a JOIN albums al ON a.artist_id = al.artist_id JOIN songs s ON al.album_id = s.album_id JOIN song_genre sg ON s.song_id = sg.song_id JOIN genres g ON sg.genre_id = g.genre_id
